name: Valence Space
description:
A space survival game in which you manage  and repair a space station to stay alive

WARNING: this is a tech demo, not an actual game release

How to play:

-wasd to move

-refill food and water to eat and drink

-stay inside space station to refill O2

-sleep before it becomes hour 12

-don't fall asleep outside, you will die

-use healray to repair station parts using copper and iron(press 2 while in space)

-use drill to mine fuel, copper and iron(press 1 while in space)

-go to the generator to refuel it, if the generator does not have a flame, you will not regen  O2 and will be unable to use each room
